page.title: 06Vicars Interview continued.
page.content: house but planning permission cannot be obtained for estates.A school opened in 1850 in an upstairs room.It was closed in 1969 due to falling numbers.Upleadon is mentioned in the Domesday book and it had the same church. {What are the advantages or otherwise {of living in the country?} Advantages _ The pace of life is slower.There is a closer community spirit which is much friendlier.People work together away from pollution. Disadvantages _Shopping is difficult and public transport is poor especially for the elderly.There are 2 buses to and from Gloucester each day. In the case of accident or fire the ambulance or fire engine has to come from a distance. {The 5 parishes are:}Upleadon, Redmarley,Pauntley_the birth place of
